title: FS both johnsons and a Matty White Cap
author: Dakiek01

posts.post_title: FS both johnsons and a Matty White Cap
posts.post_content:
Johnson Portrait $520 measures correct is missing part of the top right corner some creasing.  Small staining by name. Presents well other than that

Johnson Hands PB Back $475 measures correct has creasing and some staining. Presents well other than those

PSA 1 Matty White Cap SOLD Presents very well does have a small pin hole right above his hat and tiny crease top right of card.  To double check it does measure correct.

Prices will include tracked bubble mailer shipping. Paypal friends please if goods add 3%.  Sold comment will trump on going negotiations.  PM is fine also fine and if you prefer email is [url]dkiekhefer@gmail.com[/url]. Thanks
